tags.name: /v1/agenda/calendars
tags.description: Manages agenda calendars associated to users and spaces

tags.name: /v1/agenda/events
tags.description: Manages agenda events associated to users and spaces

tags.name: /v1/agenda/settings
tags.description: Manages agenda settings associated to users

get.description: Retrieves the list of calendars available for an owner of type user or space, identitifed by its identity technical identifier. If no designated owner, all calendars available for authenticated user will be retrieved.

parameters.name: ownerIds
parameters.description: Limit of calendar owner identity ids to incluse in results

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Whether return size of results or not

get.summary: Retrieves a calendar identified by its technical identifier
get.description: Retrieves a calendar identified by its technical identifier

get.summary: Retrieves the list of events available for an owner of type user or space
get.description: Retrieves the list of events available for an owner of type user or space, identitifed by its identity technical identifier. If no designated owner, all events available for authenticated user will be retrieved.

parameters.name: ownerIds
parameters.description: Identity technical identifiers of calendar owners

parameters.name: attendeeIdentityId
parameters.description: Attendee identity identifier to filter on events where user is attendee

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of results to return, used only when end date isn't set

parameters.name: responseTypes
parameters.description: Attendee Response statuses to filter events by attendee response

get.summary: Retrieves the list of pending date polls for currently authenticated user
get.description: Retrieves the list of pending date polls for currently authenticated user.

parameters.name: ownerIds
parameters.description: Identity technical identifiers of calendar owners

get.summary: Retrieves an event identified by its technical identifier
get.description: Retrieves an event identified by its technical identifier

get.summary: Retrieves the list of pending events for currently authenticated user
get.description: Retrieves the list of pending events for currently authenticated user.

parameters.name: ownerIds
parameters.description: Identity technical identifiers of calendar owners

get.summary: Search the list of events available with query for an owner of type user or space
get.description: Search the list of events available with query for an owner of type user or space, identified by its identity technical identifier. If no designated owner, all events available for authenticated user will be retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieves an event identified by its technical identifier
get.description: Retrieves an event identified by its technical identifier

parameters.name: firstOccurrence
parameters.description: Whether to retrieve first occurrence or not

delete.summary: Delete an existing event or delay deleting an existing event with a fixed period.

patch.summary: Update an attribute of an existing event
patch.description: Update an attribute of an existing event

parameters.name: updateAllOccurrences
parameters.description: Update all event occurrences or only parent occurrence

parameters.name: sendInvitations
parameters.description: Whether notify attendees about the modification or not

get.summary: Retrieves the list of exceptional occurrences of an event
get.description: Retrieves the list of exceptional occurrences of an event

get.summary: Retrieve preferred reminders for currently authenticated user for an event
get.description: Retrieve preferred reminders for currently authenticated user for an event identified by its technical identifier.

put.summary: Update the list of preferred reminders for authenticated user on a selected event.
put.description: Update the list of preferred reminders for authenticated user on a selected event

parameters.name: upcoming
parameters.description: Whether apply on Event occurrence and its upcoming or not

requestBody.description: List of reminders to store on event for currently authenticated user

get.summary: Retrieves currently authenticated user response to an event
get.description: Retrieves currently authenticated (using token or effectively authenticated) user response to an event.

get.summary: Send event invitation response for currently authenticated user
get.description: Send event invitation response for currently authenticated user (using token or effectively authenticated)

parameters.name: response
parameters.description: Response to event invitation. Possible values: ACCEPTED, DECLINED or TENTATIVE.

parameters.name: upcoming
parameters.description: Whether apply response on upcoming event of a recurrent event or not

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: User token used to identify user and his response to apply new reponse even when user is not authenticated

parameters.name: redirect
parameters.description: Whether redirect to Event details after applying new response or not

post.summary: Select an Date Option for an event having multiple dates options
post.description: Select an Date Option for an event having multiple dates options

post.summary: Undo deleting event if not yet effectively deleted
post.description: Undo deleting event if not yet effectively deleted

post.summary: Registers voted date poll options for currently authenticated user
post.description: Registers voted date poll options for currently authenticated user

dateOptionId.description: Accepted event date options technical identifier

post.summary: Registers voted date poll option for currently authenticated user
post.description: Registers voted date poll option for currently authenticated user

delete.summary: Dismisses vote on date poll option for currently authenticated user
delete.description: Dismisses vote on date poll option for currently authenticated user

put.summary: Saves agenda settings for authenticated user
put.description: Saves agenda settings for authenticated user

delete.summary: Deletes agenda connector settings for authenticated user
delete.description: Deletes agenda connector settings for authenticated user

patch.summary: Saves agenda connector settings for authenticated user
patch.description: Saves agenda connector settings for authenticated user

post.summary: Saves agenda connector Client API Key that will be accessible by all users to access connector remote API
post.description: Saves agenda connector Client API Key that will be accessible by all users to access connector remote API

post.summary: Saves agenda connector Client Secret Key that will be accessible by all users to access connector remote API
post.description: Saves agenda connector Client Secret Key that will be accessible by all users to access connector remote API

post.summary: Saves agenda connector status whether enabled or disabled for all users
post.description: Saves agenda connector status whether enabled or disabled for all users

isOauth.description: Remote connector uses Oauth or not

patch.summary: Saves agenda time zone setting for authenticated user
patch.description: Saves agenda time zone setting for authenticated user

post.summary: Saves enabled web conferencing provider to use for all users
post.description: Saves enabled web conferencing provider to use for all users
